application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Rear dormer roof extension; installation of two rooflights in rear outrigger roofslope and two rooflight in front and gable roofslopes
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 25_HG_E.F.Ps. (Existing Floor Plans), 25_HG_P.S.P (Proposed Site Plan), 25_HG_P.P.01 (Proposed First Floor ), 25_HG_P.P.02 (Proposed Loft), 25_HG_P.P.03 (Proposed Roof Plan), 25_HG_P.E.01-02 (Proposed Front and Rear Elevations), 25_HG_P.E.03 (Proposed Side elevation), 25_HG_P.E.04 (Proposed Side elevation), 25_HG_P.S.01-01.1 (Proposed Sections), 25_HG_P.S.02 (Proposed Section 2), 25_HG_L.P (Location and Existing Site Plan), 25_HG_P.S.P (Proposed Site Plan), 25_HG_Parking (Parking Provision), Heritage Design and Access Statement, Fire Strategy Statement.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | The proposed two rooflights to the rear roof extension shall lie flush with the roof and shall not be openable to a balcony.

Reason: To ensure that the design harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
